name: D&D 5e Subclass: Electrician Artificer
description:
An artificer subclass focused on creating power sources to bring constructs and electronics to life! Best suited for modern or sci-fi settings, but can work anywhere if you try hard enough.

This subclass is an untested portfolio piece. While I worked hard to try balancing it, it is far from perfect. If you choose to play with this subclass, feel free to tweak and change what you want to make it better to play.
